public Map<String, Object> addDataToIndex (String indexName, String stringData, Map<String, Object> indexArgs)

Add data to an index without an input, using HTTP to submit a string

Parameters
indexName The name of the index to update
stringData The data string to send
indexArgs Optional map of arguments to apply to the update
Returns
  • The index that has been updated

public Boolean addDataToTcpInput (String portNumber, String stringData)

Add data to a tcp input on a given port

Parameters
portNumber The TCP Port Number to use
stringData The data string to add
Returns
  • Success or Failure
Throws
SplunkConnectorException

Parameters
portNumber The UDP Port Number to use
data The data string to add
Returns

Throws
SplunkConnectorException

public Map<String, Object> cleanIndex (String indexName, int maxSeconds)

Clean the index, which removes all events from it

Parameters
indexName The name of the index to clean
maxSeconds Optional how long to wait, -1 is forever (not recommended on a Connector). Default is 180s
Returns
  • the cleaned index

public void connect (String username, String password, String host, String port)

Connect to splunk instance

Parameters
username The username to connect to
password The password to use for connection
host The host of the splunk server
port The port of the splunk server

public Map<String, Object> runBlockingSearch (String searchQuery, Map<String, Object> searchArgs)

Run a blocking search, which returns synchronously after waiting for the search to complete (blocking the Splunk Server)

Parameters
searchQuery The query string
searchArgs An optional map of search arguments
Returns
  • The results as a HashMap
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when the search cannot execute

public void runExportSearch (String searchQuery, String earliestTime, String latestTime, SearchMode searchMode, OutputMode outputMode, SourceCallback callback)

Run an export search

Parameters
searchQuery The search query to run
earliestTime The earliest time for the search, defaults for an hour before now
latestTime The latest time, defaults to now
searchMode The searchmode, realtime or normal
outputMode The output mode, XML or JSON
callback The sourcecallback to return results to
Returns
  • A list of the Search Results found from the export search.
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is an issue running the search

public void runNormalSearch (String searchQuery, Map<String, Object> searchArgs, SourceCallback searchCallback)

Run a search and wait for response

Parameters
searchQuery The search query
searchArgs The optional search arguments
searchCallback The SourceCallback to return results to
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is an error connecting to splunk

public List<Map<String, Object>> runOneShotSearch (String searchQuery, String earliestTime, String latestTime, Map<String, String> args)

Run a basic oneshot search and display results

Parameters
searchQuery The search query
earliestTime The earliest time
latestTime The latest time
args Optional map of arguments
Returns
  • A List of HashMaps (The results of the oneshot search)
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is an error running the search on Splunk

public void runRealTimeSearch (String searchQuery, String earliestTime, String latestTime, int statusBuckets, int previewCount, SourceCallback callback)

Run a realtime search and process the response returns via a sourcecallback@

Parameters
searchQuery The query to run in realtime
earliestTime The earliest time to search for, defaults to "rt"
latestTime The latest time to search for, defaults to "rt"
statusBuckets The status buckets to use - defaults to 300
previewCount The number of previews to retrieve - defaults to 100
callback The callback object to stream results
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is a problem setting up the runtime search

public List<Map<String, Object>> runSavedSearch (String searchName)

Run a Saved Search

Parameters
searchName The name of query
Returns
  • List of Hashmaps
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is an issue executing

public List<Map<String, Object>> runSavedSearchWithArguments (String searchName, Map<String, Object> customArgs, SavedSearchDispatchArgs searchDispatchArgs)

Run a Saved Search with arguments

Parameters
searchName The name of the searh
customArgs Custom Arguments, Optional list of custom arguments to supply
searchDispatchArgs Optional list of search dispatch arguments
Returns
  • The results as a List of Hashmaps
Throws
SplunkConnectorException when there is an issue running the saved search
